pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Tranquility and Peace $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Prismarine is an oceanic gem; find it in the depths of the oceans.
$(o)Prismarine crystals are key when attempting to calm the mind, body, and spirit. They are instrumental in magics of protection.$()
